nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. Northwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Washington's Birthday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain before 10am, then rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Rain And Snow Showers Likely
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 1am, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 46. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 10pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. South southeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Rain And Snow Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before 7am, then rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Rain Showers then Rain And Snow Likely
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 4am, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Chance Rain And Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 1am, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 31. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night

nws.name: Saturday
